EmailTemplate.name: 2024 - Q2 - Aggregates
EmailTemplate.subject: Affordable Modular Office Building for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi! Are you looking for a cost-effective and efficient workspace solution for your aggregates operations?
We offer modular office buildings designed to meet your specific needs with quick installation and customizable designs.
--> View modular offices https://www.boxxmodular.com/offices/
--> View used building inventory https://www.boxxmodular.com/used-modular/?restroom=0&areamin=0&areamax=null
To connect with us for more information: --> Reply to this email
--> Request a quote on our website https://www.boxxmodular.com/quote-request/
--> Call 877-966-7839 to speak with one of our local experts
We are here to help!
